de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler

Interface TnccsContentHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TnccContentHandler, TncsContentHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTnccContentHandler, DefaultTncsContentHandler

    public interface TnccsContentHandler
    Generic content handler base to handle all message content and message exceptions. It manages different message handlers and dispatches the received messages to these handlers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TnccsMessage> collectMessages()
      Requests the handler to ask its handlers for messages they want to sent in a batch.
      void dumpExceptions(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
      Forwards a list of of minor validation exceptions but does not allow the handler to send error messages in return.
      void dumpMessages(List<? extends TnccsMessage> list)
      Forwards a list of messages from a batch but does not allow the handler to send messages in return.
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState getAccessDecision()
      Requests an access decision, that is made by the contained handlers based on evaluation data (e.g. result message, IMV recommendation)
      List<TnccsMessage> handleExceptions(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
      Handles a list of minor validation exceptions and returns a list of error messages for a new batch if necessary.
      List<TnccsMessage> handleMessages(List<? extends TnccsMessage> list)
      Handles a list of message from a batch and returns a list of messages for a new batch if necessary.
      void setConnectionState(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState state)
      Notifies the handler that the state of the related connection has changed.

      • setConnectionState

        void setConnectionState(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState state)
        Notifies the handler that the state of the related connection has changed.
        Parameters:
        state - the connection state

      • collectMessages

        List<TnccsMessage> collectMessages()
        Requests the handler to ask its handlers for messages they want to sent in a batch.
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • handleMessages

        List<TnccsMessage> handleMessages(List<? extends TnccsMessage> list)
        Handles a list of message from a batch and returns a list of messages for a new batch if necessary.
        Parameters:
        list - a list of messages to handle
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • dumpMessages

        void dumpMessages(List<? extends TnccsMessage> list)
        Forwards a list of messages from a batch but does not allow the handler to send messages in return.
        Parameters:
        list - a list of messages to dump

      • handleExceptions

        List<TnccsMessage> handleExceptions(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
        Handles a list of minor validation exceptions and returns a list of error messages for a new batch if necessary.
        Parameters:
        exceptions - a list of exceptions
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • dumpExceptions

        void dumpExceptions(List<ValidationException> exceptions)
        Forwards a list of of minor validation exceptions but does not allow the handler to send error messages in return.
        Parameters:
        exceptions - a list of exceptions to dump

      • getAccessDecision

        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState getAccessDecision()
        Requests an access decision, that is made by the contained handlers based on evaluation data (e.g. result message, IMV recommendation)
        Returns:
        a connection state reflecting the access decision
